pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Wu3 dao3 Xue2 yuan4

definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
to tread on/to trample/to stamp/to fulfill/Taiwan pr. [dao4]

sentences.english: Yao Xian, Shanxi native, is currently studying choreography at Beijing Dance Academy.
sentences.chinese: 姚弦，山西太原人，現就讀於北京舞蹈學院編導系。
